Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14995. I trust this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $14,995. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $14,995
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
